flawed_nl_solution:
She has 180 minutes to do work because 3 times 60 equals <<3*60=180>>180
She has already spent 150 minutes on homework because 45 plus 30 plus 50 plus 25 equals <<45+30+50+25=150>>150
She has 40 minutes to finish her project because 180 minus 150 equals <<180-150=40>>40.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
